channel.title: Play on Dave F. Kleinschmidt
channel.description: Recent content in Play on Dave F. Kleinschmidt

item.title: Play
item.description: I like making things Open-source projects I've contributed to include JuliaStats, Gadfly (ggplot-style visualization for Julia), FAAV (now FAVE), latexdiff, and, most importantly, lolcommits. I ride bikes (even, yes, through the Rochester winter). My commuter bike is a fixie I built up on a beater 10-speed Fuji frame with some pretty ostentatious red deep-v wheels, and when I feel like wrapping myself in spandex I have a 1993 Bianchi Campione, which sports a fabulously 90s purple-and-black paint job.
